refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets the value of a FLTK valuator to a number provided by the user.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: FLsetVal_i forces the value of a valuator to a number provided by the user.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ihandle -- an integer number (used as unique identifier) taken from the output of a previously located widget opcode (which corresponds to the target widget). It is used to unequivocally identify the widget when modifying its appearance with this class of opcodes. The user must not set the ihandle value directly, otherwise a Csound crash will occur.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: ivalue -- Value to set the widget to.
refsect1.note: FLsetVal is not fully implemented yet, and may crash in certain cases (e.g. when setting the value of a widget connected to a FLvalue widget- in this case use two separate FLsetVal_i).
